course_title: Graduate Communication Skills for Multilingual Learners II
class_notes:
The objective of the course is to help students improve their conversation, writing, and presentation skills.  Students are required to attend half (7) of the classes in the 14 week semester, once per week. Students must sign up in Canvas in advance for each class meeting. The class meetings are scheduled for:
Tuesdays 5:30-7:00 pm (On campus, Room TBD)
Thursdays 5:30-7:00 pm (On campus, Room TBD)
Saturdays 10-11:30 am (On Zoom)
